name: A Sight of Survival
description:
A Sight of Survival is a first person horror game where all you have is your flashlight, and wits, to get you out.

Sneak your way past dangerous enemies as you attempt to escape this maze-like hell.

This game was designed as a 3rd year project, exploring the elements that go into creating an immersive horror experience. This primarily focused on the use of lighting and 3D sound as ways of inciting fear. This project was created in collaboration with Linda Sumbu
